Text.Name: txt.PageHeading/txt.PageIntro
Text.Text: The Docking Port Alignment Indicator helps your docking by providing you with a comprehensive docking dispay.

Text.Name: Image.toolbar/Image.line3/Image.line2/Image.line1/Image.dot/txt.Body (1)
Text.Text: Toggle the Docking Port Alignment Indicator panel by clicking on the toolbar button.

Text.Name: txt.PageHeading
Text.Text: How to Dock using Docking Port Alignment Indicator

Text.Name: txt.AlignHeading
Text.Text: Aligning to the target docking port

Text.Name: txt.AlignHeading/txt.AlignBody
Text.Text: • Control your vessel from the docking port you want to dock with. • Use Flight controls to rotate and translate your vessel. • When all markers are aligned in the center, your docking port is aligned with the target docking port.

Text.Name: Image.dpai_panel_in_space/Img.LineRelPos/Img.LineRelPos_1/Image.DotRelPos/txt.RelPosHeading/txt.RelPosBody
Text.Text: No direct control, moves according to velocity vector.

Text.Name: Image.dpai_panel_in_space/Img.LineHeading_0/Img.LineHeading_1/Image.dot/txt.ParagraphHeading (1)/txt.ParagraphBody
Text.Text: Controlled via yaw and pitch controls.

Text.Name: Img.PanelAligned/Img.LineVel_0 (1)/Img.LineVel_1/Img.DotVel/txt.VelBody
Text.Text: All docking indicators are aligned. Docking is now possible by approaching slowly.
